name: Nome
your-sheet-is-being-updated-to-version-4: Your sheet is being updated to version 4.03. This may take a few seconds to complete.
read-this-note-in-the-meantime: Read this note in the meantime; it should be complete when you finish.
you-can-learn-more-about-sheet-features: You can learn more about the sheet features at the wiki page:
here-is-a-summary-of-changes: Here is a summary of changes:
better-handling-of-ammo: Version 4.02: Better handling for changes in ammo capacity.
updated-glories-and-deeds: Version 4.02: Updated Glories and Deeds & Exploits section, so they operate like Perks, Equipment, Armor.
various-css-updates-402: Version 4.02: Behind the scenes CSS updates.
minor-tweaks-to-visual-style: Version 4.01: Minor tweaks to visual style
added-new-buttons: Version 4.01: Added new buttons to torg rolltemplate.
added-some-elements-to-stort-tab: Version 4.01: Added some elements to Story tab.
a-new-visual-design-and-layout: A new visual design and layout.
headings-on-the-abilities-page: Every heading on the Abilities page does something. Hover over them or click them to see.
added-automatic-calculation-of-most-thin: Added automatic calculation of most things on the sheet - attributes, skills, attacks, cosm axioms, wounds, shock, armour, and so on.
added-skill-display-option: Added skill display option, where you can choose which are shown or hidden via settings, and use them by name in macros.
added-status-buttons: Added status buttons, so you can spend possibilities, suffer shock or wounds, or apply stymied, vulnerable, and fatigue results with the click of a button.
combined-weapons-and-powers: Combined Weapons and Powers into a single repeating section, which takes up less space.
added-a-repeating-section-for-armor: Added a repeating section for armor, so you aren't limited to two sets. there is a Worn checkbox, and the stats of all armor worn will be applied according to the rules (take best armor, worst dex, and total fatigue).
cosm-axioms-are-filled-in-automatically: Cosm axioms are filled in automatically, and added a popup for Cosm-specific Possibilities.
popup-for-recording-permanent-changes: Added popup for recording permanent changes to Wounds, Shock, Toughness, and Move, perhaps due to Perks.
added-expandable-description-boxes: Added expandable description boxes for each of Perks, Armour, Equipment, and Weapons and Powers.
revised-action-and-damage-rolltemplates: Revised action and damage rolltemplates, so now you are asked for a modifier, and then are given a roll total. Using UP and Possibilities takes the current skill or ability into account.
clearance-level-is-calculated: Your Clearance level is calculated automatically from Experience.
character-should-be-updated-now: Your character should be updated now. Have fun!
if-attributes-aren-t-updating-properly: If attributes aren't updating properly after the update, close the sheet and reopen it. You only need to do this once.
you-can-get-this-announcement-page-back: You can get this Announcement page back from the settings cog at the right.
record-your-moments-of-glory: Record the details of your moments of Glory.
this-tab-is-primarily-for-the-gm-and-wil: This tab is primarily for the GM and will provide a condensed statistic listing handy for tracking quick npcs and monsters.
this-tab-is-primarily-for-the-gm--and-wi: This tab is primarily for the GM, and will include sections for adding notes, quick rolls, and other time-saving tools for when the GM is running an adventure. Players might use it for taking notes.
manually-drag-in-this-box: manually drag in this box to copy the address (roll20 doesnt let us embed links).
front-page: Front Page of the Character Sheet.
back-page: Back Page of the Character Sheet.
quick-npcs: Quick NPCs, Monsters, and the like.
note-sheet: Note taking, and streamlining play for GMs.
use-tokens-to-remember-last-roll: to remember the last roll for rerolls, must use tokens.
clikc-to-roll-for-multi-action: click to roll for Multi-Action Bonus
only-for-fatigue: Only for Fatigue initiative event, not backlash.
click-to-add-derived-stat-bonus: Click to add derived stat bonuses
click-name-to-roll-attack: Click the name to roll an attack.
click-damage-to-roll-for-damage: Click Damage to roll for damage.
anything-here-will-be-printed-out-when-a: anything here will be printed out when attacking.
anything-here-will-be-printed-out-when-r: anything here will be printed out when rolling damage
shock-suffered-on-fatigue: Shock suffered on Fatigue initiative event
enter-details-of-connections: Your Connections, Romances, and other relationships.
update-connections-section: Version 4.03: Added a Connections section on story tab.
added-translation-tags: Version 4.03: Added translation tags (not in sheet workers yet, and skills wont be sorted alphabetically).
fixed-advancement-worker: Version 4.03: advancement costs work properly if row removed.
ammo-cant-go-below-zero: Version 4.03: Cant set ammo to a negative score now.
fixed-tab-display-problem: Version 4.04: Fixed the problem displaying the tabs after Roll20 internal changes.
